who has led Google for a decade, will become executive chairman focusing on external relations, deals and government relations.New Yorker writer Ken Auletta , who has written a book on the company, reported Friday that Eric Schmidt had been nudged aside. The two first connected on the Sunday foreign-affairs program " Fareed Zakaria GPS, which McGuirk executive produced and where Eric Schmidt was a regular guest.
